title: I'm connected to the internet but my phone won't let me use certain apps like twitter or discord.
content:
My phone says I'm connected to wifi but when I go to use certain apps, It won't let me, the apps say that I'm not connected to the internet.
Apps like Youtube, The bult in google search engine, And instagram all work fine, but apps like Discord, Twitter, Reddit, and The play store, don't work at all because they say I'm not connected to the internet.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
